caption: The ska music features a male voice singing and being accompanied by another male backing vocal. The tempo is medium-fast, specific to the ska genre. The drums play a somewhat busy rhythm and the bass guitar plays a simple repeating bass line. In the background a piano accompanies the singer. Towards the end of the music excerpt a saxophone can be heard.
